PROJECT(libogg C)

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.6)

SET(LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../..")
SET(KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR "${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/../..")

INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Common.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Platform.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Compiler.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Build/CMake/ExternalCommon.cmake)

SET_PROPERTY(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

SET(LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR "${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/lib/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")

UpdateExternalLib("ogg" "libogg" "git://github.com/xiph/ogg.git" "0acd32d7cabf7e41cc29ea7c2bbffde969ff1ba0")

FOREACH(flag_var
		CMAKE_C_FLAGS CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS)
	IF(KLAYGE_COMPILER_MSVC)
		STRING(REPLACE "/W4" "/W0" ${flag_var} "${${flag_var}}")
		STRING(REPLACE "/WX" "/WX-" ${flag_var} "${${flag_var}}")
	ELSE()
		STRING(REPLACE "-Wall" "-w" ${flag_var} "${${flag_var}}")
		STRING(REPLACE "-Werror" "-Wno-error" ${flag_var} "${${flag_var}}")
	ENDIF()
ENDFOREACH()

SET(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF)
SET(BUILD_FRAMEWORK OFF)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${LIBOGG_PROJECT_DIR}/ogg "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ogg")

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(ogg PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${LIBOGG_OUTPUT_DIR}
	PROJECT_LABEL ogg
	DEBUG_POSTFIX ${CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX}
	OUTPUT_NAME ogg_static${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
)
